{"id":858225333,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1670780293,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"10 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/858225333/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"7.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isPalindrome(string s) {\n        int n = s.size(), l = 0, r = n - 1;\n        while (l < r) {\n            while (l < r && !isalnum(s[l])) {\n                l++;\n            }\n            while (l < r && !isalnum(s[r])) {\n                r--;\n            }\n            if (tolower(s[l++]) != tolower(s[r--])) {\n                return false;\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome","has_notes":false}
